title: Tripod Incense Burner (Censer) with Peony-Leaf Scrolls, Netlike Petals, and Masklike Legs
objectDate: Northern Song (960–1127) or Jin dynasty (1115–1234), c. 12th century
medium: Yaozhou ware; stoneware with underglaze carved and molded decoration
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of Dorothy Braude Edinburg to the Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection
